title: #259 – Thomas Tull: From Batman Dark Knight Trilogy to AI and the Rolling Stones
description: Thomas Tull is founder of Legendary Entertainment, Tulco, part-owner of Pittsburgh Steelers, and guitarist for the band Ghost Hounds.
